name: Electrou
description:
Electrou is a short puzzle game in which you cannot avoid getting hurt by lasers and laser powered creatures but you must tactically acquire and use health potions in order to beat the level.

Bugs I noticed but could not fix because I was running low on time for the submission

1. The hearts do not turn off in the proper order in some levels

2. Sometimes a certain level wont load, so you have to click "escape" to open the pause menu and click restart, then it should work
